Comment: Two groups of people completely taling passed each other on the whole knuckle tattoo thing. First of all, it's completely irrelevant if it's a gang tattoo or not. Gang members still get due process. And we don't deport people based on gang status anyway.   As to the doctored part, that's also irrelevant. Maybe the tattoos he has are gang related or maybe not. The part that's doctored (adding the explanatory M S 1 3 above the marijuana, smiley, cross, skull) arent what people are claiming makes him a gang member. No one, Trump included, thinks his knuckles have the little M S 1 3 on them. They think the actual tattoos represent those things.   Trump isn't asking the guy to admit the doctored part is real. He's asking him to admit the real part it a gang tattoo. Again, maybe it is maybe it isn't. But people like OP are confusing the real (also irrelevant) issue with the fake (irrelevant) issue. Seems they're doing it intentionally either for the views or for the lulz or to try to score political points with the ignorant folks that populate reddit threads like this one.
